div.p: [...] the sluice gates in Montila are closed and the canal [...] I have shut [...] near Boukolon Kome [... Know that] the dykes and the bridges cannot [...] to deliberate whether it is necessary to close one sluice gate in Ptolemais. Farewell. Year 29, Epeiph 5. Translation: B. van Beek, P.Petr. Kleon 18
